scripts.start: npm run mode:local && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve
scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:root && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:all:ci: npm run install:shared:ci && npm run install:root:ci && npm run install:apps:ci
scripts.install:shared: cd shared && npm config delete registry || true && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm cache clean --force && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.install:shared:ci: cd shared && npm config delete registry || true && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.install:apps: npm run install:auth && npm run install:layout && npm run install:home && npm run install:angular && npm run install:vue && npm run install:react && npm run install:vanilla && npm run install:webcomponents && npm run install:typescript && npm run install:jquery && npm run install:svelte
scripts.install:apps:ci: npm run install:auth:ci && npm run install:layout:ci && npm run install:home:ci && npm run install:angular:ci && npm run install:vue:ci && npm run install:react:ci && npm run install:vanilla:ci && npm run install:webcomponents:ci && npm run install:typescript:ci && npm run install:jquery:ci && npm run install:svelte:ci
scripts.build:apps: npm run mode:local && npm run build:root && npm run build
scripts.build:apps:dev: npm run mode:local && npm run build:root:dev && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:apps:prod: npm run mode:local && npm run build:root:prod && npm run build:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:auth && npm run build:layout && npm run build:home && npm run build:angular && npm run build:vue && npm run build:react && npm run build:vanilla && npm run build:webcomponents && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:svelte
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:auth:dev && npm run build:layout:dev && npm run build:home:dev && npm run build:angular:dev && npm run build:vue:dev && npm run build:react:dev && npm run build:vanilla:dev && npm run build:webcomponents:dev && npm run build:typescript:dev && npm run build:jquery:dev && npm run build:svelte:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:auth:prod && npm run build:layout:prod && npm run build:home:prod && npm run build:angular:prod && npm run build:vue:prod && npm run build:react:prod && npm run build:vanilla:prod && npm run build:webcomponents:prod && npm run build:typescript:prod && npm run build:jquery:prod && npm run build:svelte:prod
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:apps
scripts.clean:apps: npm run clean:auth && npm run clean:layout && npm run clean:home && npm run clean:angular && npm run clean:vue && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:vanilla && npm run clean:webcomponents && npm run clean:typescript && npm run clean:jquery && npm run clean:svelte
scripts.publish:npm:prod: bash -c "SKIP_INSTALL=true npm run fix:npm:deps" && bash ./scripts/publish-npm.sh patch prod
scripts.publish:nexus:prod: bash -c "SKIP_INSTALL=true npm run fix:nexus:deps" && bash ./scripts/publish-nexus.sh patch prod

scripts.publish:npm:auth: cd single-spa-auth-app && npm run build:prod && npm publish

scripts.serve:npm: npm run mode:npm && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve:npm
scripts.serve:nexus: npm run mode:nexus && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve:nexus
scripts.serve:nexus:dev: npm run mode:nexus && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve
scripts.serve:nexus:prod: npm run mode:nexus && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve
scripts.serve:github: npm run mode:github && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve:github
scripts.serve:aws: npm run mode:aws && cd single-spa-root && npm run serve:aws
scripts.deploy:aws: npm run mode:aws && npm run build:root:aws:prod && npm run deploy:s3:prod
scripts.deploy:aws:dev: npm run mode:aws && npm run build:root:aws:dev && npm run deploy:s3:dev
scripts.deploy:aws:prod: npm run mode:aws && npm run build:root:aws:prod && npm run deploy:s3:prod
scripts.sync:s3:root: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-root/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/ --delete --exclude "*.hot-update.*"'
scripts.sync:s3:auth: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-auth-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/auth-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:layout: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-layout-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/layout-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:home: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-home-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/home-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:angular: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-angular-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/angular-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:vue: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-vue-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/vue-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:react: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-react-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/react-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:vanilla: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-vanilla-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/vanilla-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:webcomponents: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-webcomponents-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/webcomponents-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:typescript: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-typescript-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/typescript-app/ --delete'
scripts.sync:s3:jquery: npm run mode:aws && bash -c 'aws s3 sync single-spa-jquery-app/dist/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/@$ORG_NAME/jquery-app/ --delete'

scripts.sync:s3:all: npm run mode:aws && npm run sync:s3:root && npm run sync:s3:auth && npm run sync:s3:layout && npm run sync:s3:home && npm run sync:s3:angular && npm run sync:s3:vue && npm run sync:s3:react && npm run sync:s3:vanilla && npm run sync:s3:webcomponents && npm run sync:s3:typescript && npm run sync:s3:jquery && npm run sync:s3:svelte
scripts.registry:status: echo 'Current registry:' && npm config get registry
scripts.version:help: echo '📦 Version Manager' && echo '' && echo '🔄 Publishing:' && echo '  npm run publish:npm:patch - Auto-bump patch + publish to NPM' && echo '  npm run publish:nexus:patch - Auto-bump patch + publish to Nexus' && echo '' && echo '📋 Manual Version:' && echo '  npm run version:bump:patch - 0.1.0 → 0.1.1' && echo '  npm run version:bump:minor - 0.1.0 → 0.2.0' && echo '  npm run version:set 1.2.3 - Set all to 1.2.3' && echo '' && echo '🔍 Info:' && echo '  npm run version:current - Show versions' && echo '  npm run version:clean - Remove _trigger fields'
